Name: Infinity Tempest
About the game: The story of the game: A lethal virus has spread across the world and three humanoid android heroes have been sent to steal confidential data from the laboratory accused of creating the virus. The data theft was a success but now they must run away from stalking robots that will do anything to destroy them along with the stolen data! You must help the three to escape from their pursuers in an endless race for the survival of humanity. About the gameplay: • This game is an endless run; • Those who play alone must run endlessly dodging obstacles and enemies to increase their personal record; • Who plays with friends must compete dodging obstacles and enemies to see who can stand the longest without dying. Game Features: • Supports three simultaneous local players; • Enemies appear randomly; • Addictive and original soundtrack! • The game saves your overall record and calculates the current distance covered. What do they say about the game? *Steam User: 'Cool runner game. Very challenging.' / *Steam User: 'A simple but very beautiful and challenging game.' / *Steam User: 'The multiplayer mode, which is a great differential of this game! With a very intense game player where your goal is to cover the greatest distance before dying!' /
